facultyName: College of Arts, Humanities and Business
description: Our new MSc in Language Technologies is aimed at those seeking to develop critical understanding of issues pertaining to the development and application of computer technology to language-based problems, and to prepare them for a career in the fast-growing field of language technologies.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
